songs.title: This Is Our Song
songs.lyrics:
So let's sing na, na na na na, hey ya
Cmon and sing na, na na na na, hey ya

This is our song
That's all that matters cause
We all belong right here together
There's nothin better
Than singing along
This is our summer
This is our song

Come grab your guitar
Sit by the fire
Cause we all need a song
When we're weary and tired
We'll sit here
Together
And sing it out loud

This is our song
That's all that matters cause
We all belong right here together
There's nothin better
Than singing along
This is our summer
And this is our song
This our song
This is our song

Thsi is our song

C'mon and sing na, na na na na, hey ya
C'mon and sing na, na na na na, hey ya
C'mon and sing na, na na na na, hey ya
C'mon and sing na, na na na na, hey ya

This is our song
That's all that matters cause
We all belong right here together
There's nothin better
Than singing along
This is our summer

This is our song
That's all that matters cause
We all belong right here together
There's nothin better
Than singing along
This is our summer
This is our song
This is our song
This is our song
This is our song
